name: 2023 International Conference on Statistics, Data Science and Computational Intelligence
content: CSDSCI 2023 invites prospective authors to submit original and previously unpublished research and application papers in all spectrums of related fields. All accepted papers of CSDSCI 2023 will be published in conference proceedings and submitted for indexing by EI and Scopus. The conference topics cover but are not limited to the following areas: Statistics and Applications Probability theory Bayesian Statistics Mathematical Statistics Applied Statistics Spatial Statistics Statistics Software Statistical Forecasting and Decision Making Data Technology Data collection Data mining Data management Data visualization Machine Learning and Algorithms Neural Networks and Deep Learning Data modeling Model development and testing Big data technology and application scenarios Data Security and Privacy Protection Computational intelligence Genetic Algorithm Simulated Annealing Algorithm Tabu search algorithm Evolutionary Algorithms heuristic algorithm Ant Colony Algorithm Artificial Fish Swarm Algorithm Particle swarm algorithm Hybrid Intelligence Algorithms Immune algorithm Rough set theory artificial intelligence Artificial neural networks Machine learning Quantum computing Intelligent Computing and Optimization Fuzzy logic Pattern recognition Knowledge discovery Intelligent decision Alternative High-Performance Computing (HPC) New Computing / Processing Technology Human-Liked Processing Distributed Intelligence Technology
